name: metabase
tagline: An open source platform for data exploration and dashboards
description: Metabase is an open-source data exploration and BI tool that lets users build dashboards and run queries without SQL. It supports self-hosted and cloud deployments, with a clean, intuitive UI and permission-based access.

features.title: Visual Query Builder
features.description: Create database queries using a point-and-click interface without writing SQL

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Build interactive dashboards with charts, tables, and visualizations

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Write custom SQL queries with syntax highlighting and auto-completion for advanced users

features.title: Database Connections
features.description: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and dozens of other data sources

features.title: Scheduled Reports
features.description: Automatically generate and email reports on a recurring schedule

features.title: Data Visualization
features.description: Create bar charts, line graphs, pie charts, maps, and other visual representations

features.title: User Permissions
features.description: Control access to databases, tables, and dashboards with role-based permissions
